name: deepfield
description: AI-driven knowledge base builder for Claude Code that iteratively learns codebases and distills institutional knowledge
author: Deepfield Team

commands.name: df-init
commands.description: Initialize kb/ directory structure with four-space architecture

commands.name: df-start
commands.description: Interactive project setup and brief.md generation

commands.name: df-status
commands.description: Display current knowledge base state and suggest next actions
